arts.ttl: Norwich off the mark under Manning as Sargent nets in win at Portsmouth
arts.sum: Liam Manning secured his first Championship win in charge of Norwich with a 2-1 victory at Portsmouth thanks to first-half goals from Harry Darling and Josh Sargent.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Norwich City: EFL Championship Preview, Gameweek 2, 2025/26
arts.sum: John Mousinho's Portsmouth host Norwich City this Saturday lunchtime with both sides having experienced mixed fortunes in their opening two games of the new season. Tuesday's improved attacking performance, largely thanks to new signing Papa Amadou Diallo's electric debut, certainly reassured Canaries fans that good times aren't too far away.

arts.ttl: Fisher starts: Norwich City team news and predicted XI to face Portsmouth
arts.sum: The latest Norwich City team news as Liam Manning's side gear up to face Portsmouth in the Championship. The post Fisher starts: Norwich City team news and predicted XI to face Portsmouth appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth vs Norwich - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Championship clash between Portsmouth and Norwich City, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Championship weekend predictions: Picks for all 12 fixtures
arts.sum: Match-ups across the Championship get detailed predictions and key player spotlights, with form analysis and potential upsets highlighted as the season heats up.
